about.title: About me
about.text1: I am a junior web developer with a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, gained through structured training at the CanSheCode online school.
about.text2: I enjoy building clean, responsive, user-friendly websites and continuously improving my skills in modern front-end development. Currently continuing my education and expanding my skills in modern web development.
about.text3: I am a dedicated and self-motivated individual with a strong work ethic, able to collaborate effectively in a team environment as well as work independently. I value integrity, continuous learning, and delivering high-quality results.
about.text4: I speak Czech, Russian and English. Outside of coding, I love nature, coffee, traveling and spending time with my two dogs.
